contentfulProduct.seoDescription: These ankle socks come in a pack of 4 and are made from 100% organic cotton. Designed for everyday wear - these classics will keep your puppies feeling great.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Ankle Socks (4-pack)

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10
These ankle socks can do it all. They come in a pack of 4 and are made from 100% organic cotton. Designed for everyday wear - these classics will keep your puppies feeling great.
Cushioned footbed provides extra softness and comfort for your soles
Blister tab protects your ankle from excessive friction with shoes
Seamless toe seam prevents irritation and bulk
Springwave arch support hugs around your midfoot to provide support
Y-stitched heel, designed to mold to your feet and ensure comfortable fit
Mesh top panels allow ventilation to help manage moisture and prevent overheating
Materials: 76% Organic Cotton, 17% Polyester, 2% Rubber, 1% Spandex, 4% Other Fibers
Made with Organic Cotton. Organic Fibers arent treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water.
4-pack; Multi XS/S includes 2 pairs White & 2 pairs Black; M/L includes 1 pair White, 1 pair Navy & 2 pairs Black
Size: XS/S fits US Women's shoe size 5.5-9 and US Men's shoe size 5-8; M/L fits US Women's shoe size 9.5-13 and US Men's shoe size 9-12
Origin: Liao Yuan, China
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Cushioned footbed provides extra softness and comfort for your soles
  • Blister tab protects your ankle from excessive friction with shoes
  • Seamless toe seam prevents irritation and bulk
  • Springwave arch support hugs around your midfoot to provide support
  • Y-stitched heel, designed to mold to your feet and ensure comfortable fit
  • Mesh top panels allow ventilation to help manage moisture and prevent overheating
  • Materials: 76% Organic Cotton, 17% Polyester, 2% Rubber, 1% Spandex, 4% Other Fibers
  • Made with Organic Cotton. Organic Fibers arent treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water.
  • 4-pack; Multi XS/S includes 2 pairs White & 2 pairs Black; M/L includes 1 pair White, 1 pair Navy & 2 pairs Black
  • Size: XS/S fits US Women's shoe size 5.5-9 and US Men's shoe size 5-8; M/L fits US Women's shoe size 9.5-13 and US Men's shoe size 9-12
  • Origin: Liao Yuan, China
